Title: Curtain Call
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), John J. Gray, John J. Gray (story editor), Crystal Liu (staff writer), Todd Kubrak (script coordinator)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Michael Chiklis, Frances Conroy
Plot: Dandy prepares for his debut performance. The Tattlers contemplate marriage, while in Hollywood, Elsa discovers she's further from love than ever before.
